#引入套件
```{r}
library(stringr)
```
```{r}
course <- c("個體經濟學","投資學","總體經濟學")
str_subset(course,"經濟學")
str_detect(course,"經濟學")

english <- c("ab","b","c","d")
str_subset(english,("b"))
str_detect(english,("b"))
str_sub(course,1,3)
```

#系 #年級 
```{r}
studentID<-c(
  '410177115','410176080','410174233','410177011','410182045','410176014')
```

```{r}
month <- c("3","4","2")
day <- c("11","5","7")
char1 <- c("月","月","月")
char2 <- c("日","日","日")
month
char1
day 
char2
str_c(month,char1,day,char2)
```
#偷懶寫法
```{r}
str_c(month,c("月"),day,c("日"))
str_c(month,"月",day,"日")
```
#加分隔
```{r}
month
day
str_c(month,day, sep="-")
str_c(month,day, sep="/")
```
